attributes.action: STOP RUSSELL BISHOP EVER BEING RELEASED FROM PRISON.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Russell Bishop is entitled to apply for parole in August 2009, he is serving LIFE for Kidnap, Attempted Murder and Sexual Assault on a 7yr old girl, he has served 17years thus far.
In 1987 he was acquitted at Lewes Crown court of the Murder of two girls, NICOLA FELLOWS and KAREN HADAWAY. 
BISHOP MUST NEVER BE RELEASED.

There is a facebook campaign which can be viewed for reference.

From the Heffron, Fellows Aand Hadaway families we beg you to support this petition.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
